Here is the list of zodiac signs and their corresponding scores based on the traditional astrological wisdom:
1. Aries - 8/10 - Natural-born leaders, Aries are known for their confidence and ambition.
2. Taurus - 7.5/10 - Reliable and practical, Tauruses are often good with money and possessive of material goods.
3. Gemini - 9/10 - Quick-witted and adaptable, Geminis are communicators par excellence, always ready to share their thoughts.
4. Cancer - 8.5/10 - Nurturing and protective, Cancers put family and close relationships at the forefront of their lives.
5. Leo - 9.5/10 - Regal and charismatic, Leos shine brightly with their confidence and natural flair for drama.
6. Virgo - 7.2/10 - Analytical and detail-oriented, Virgos are hardworking and precise in their pursuits.
7. Libra - 8.8/10 - Diplomatic and balanced, Librans strive for harmony and fairness in all aspects of life.
8. Scorpio - 9.8/10 - Passionate and intense, Scorpios are known for their sharp intuition and unyielding commitment to what they believe.
9. Sagittarius - 9.3/10 - Adventurous and optimistic, Sagittarians are always seeking truth and wisdom in the world around them.
10. Capricorn - 8.2/10 - Disciplined and ambitious, Capricorns are driven to succeed and often set high standards for themselves.
11. Aquarius - 9.5/10 - Humanitarian and innovative, Aquarians are visionaries who strive to make a positive impact on the world.
12. Pisces - 8.1/10 - Compassionate and imaginative, Pisces are dreamers who navigate the complexities of life with empathy and intuition.

Please note that these scores are subjective and based on general astrological interpretations. Each individual's personality is unique, and their actual performance in life may vary from their sign's traditional characteristics.
